abstract: Federal prosecutors announce Chinese businessman Su Bin has been sentenced to almost four years in prison for conspiring to hack computer networks of major American military contractors, including Boeing Company.
lead_paragraph: The United States District Court in Los Angeles gave Su Bin, who pleaded guilty, a term of nearly four years and ordered him to pay a fine of $10,000.

headline.main: Chinese Businessman Sentenced to Prison for Hacking U.S. Contractors

snippet: The United States District Court in Los Angeles gave Su Bin, who pleaded guilty, a term of nearly four years and ordered him to pay a fine of $10,000....
